Name: Model
Problem Configuration.Description: Determines the hierarchical bayesian evaluation model.

Name: Sub Problems
Problem Configuration.Description: Provides results from previous Korali executions.

Name: Sub Problem Variables Count
Internal Settings.Description: Number of variables in each sub-problem. Must be equal to the number of conditional priors in the hierarchical problem.

Name: Sub Problem Sample Coordinates
Internal Settings.Description: Coordinates for each sample on each sub-problem.

Name: Sub Problem Sample Log Likelihoods
Internal Settings.Description: Likelihood for each sample on each sub-problem.

Name: Sub Problem Sample Log Priors
Internal Settings.Description: Log Priors for each sample on each sub-problem
